title: Toolbox
summaries: The Toolbox is a rare accessory that is obtained when opening Presents dropped during the Christmas seasonal event, with a chance of 0.309% in pre-Hardmode and 0.288% in Hardmode. It increases item placement and tool range by 1. The effect of the Toolbox stacks with that of the Builder buff, Toolbelt, and Extendo Grip or Architect Gizmo Pack.

statistics.Tooltip: Increases block placement & tool range by 1
statistics.Sell: 1
